body_html: In my case, I would like to use 2 GPU. However the workers I have in Cloud have only 1 GPU each. So, I had to use 2 workers to employ 2 GPUs for my job. I understand that getting a bigger VM with more GPU is more efficient and would not result in this error but the configuration I am using sounds like a valid one and I find this error unnecessarily restrictive.
